resources.string: Created by Thomas LY and Anthony PERRET
Welcome to our QuizzAPP game, the rules are simple. Choose a difficulty and a theme, then a series of questions will be asked. Have fun !
Well done, you have correctly answered the 3 questions
Not bad, you answered 2 of 3 questions correctly
Could do better, you answered 1 of 3 questions correctly
Too bad, you did not answer the 3 questions correctly
